column4: can anyone suggest me which nero for linux i should download (deb 32 bit or deb 64 bit)?? I have LTS PC.????
Do you have Ubuntu 32-bit or Ubuntu 64-bit?
i have ubuntu lts
LTS means Long Term Support, has nothing to do with edition
Did you originally download the regular CD or the 64-bit CD?
actually i have installed PC version and its not 64 bit pc.
Then you need 32-bit
ok thank u dude
have ever used nero in ubuntu.
A long time ago
Before I started using free tools
Nero for Linux is a waste of money IMHO
i m downloading a trail version right now, is it available free also in any repository?
Nero is commercial proprietary software.
It is not available for free (except with the trial version)
GnomeBaker and that other thing that comes with Ubuntu are free and IMHO just as good
according to u which is the most user friendly one for burning files?
they
they're not really that much different
to which repository IMHO belongs ??
atlef: mohkohn: thanks for your kind suggestions
